metadata.title: CVE-2019-13308 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow inMagickCore/fourier.c in ComplexImage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.8').
